titles.title: A resolution commemorating the discovery of the polio vaccine and supporting efforts to eradicate the disease.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
3/24/2015--Introduced. Commends the work of Jonas Salk and Albert Sabin in developing effective, safe vaccines for polio.
Supports the Global Polio Eradication Initiative's goals and ideals and the international community in remaining committed to the eradication of polio.
Encourages continued funding for the Global Polio Eradication Initiative and scientific research so that more life-saving discoveries can be made.
